commit.message:
re PR target/63947 (Wrong fcmov suffix)

	PR target/63947
	* config/i386/i386.c (put_condition_code) <case LTU, case GEU>:
	Output "b" and "nb" suffix for FP mode.

testsuite/ChangeLog:

	PR target/63947
	* gcc.target/i386/pr63947.c: New test.

From-SVN: r217810

+	Output "b" and "nb" suffix for FP mode.
